ChangeLogs.Description:
Update Norwegian locale (Morten)
Update German Locale (Nils89)
Update Italian locale (Bito)
Hide the update button when the version has not changed
Fix an issue where status did not say 'Ignored' for ignored addons
Fix an issue with sorting by updated at after updating an addon
Fix 'Get Addons' download count not showing for less than 1000 downloads
Fix an issue with sorting 'My Addons' by status column
Fix an issue with the cursor not changing on raised buttons.

Add the ability to have WowUp start on system start (Noxis)
Add locale support to the update/install button (Linaori)
Add support for locale date/times (chops)
Update RU locales (Medok)
Update German locales (Glow)
Fix an issue with horizontal scrolling on the install by URL dialog (chops)
Linux support fixes
Performance fixes for the details dialog

Add the ability to translate plurals (Chops)
Add the alpha/beta indicator for user's default install channel to the 'Get Addons' tab (Chops)
Add new column to show the last updated time of an Addon (Linaori)
Add support for installing vir URL from CurseForge
Show the release date in a more user friendly way (Chops)
More text items are now translated with updated locales (Linaori)
New placehold thumbnail for Addons
Addon author list now limited to 3 rows
Switch to a new analytics provider.
Fix issue with addon count not changing when deleting an addon.
Several fixes for linux support

Attempt to lower background CPU usage to 0
Add translation logic for download counts (flippey)
More locale updates
Install from URL now supports WowInterface download links
Update issues with details dialog.
Fix an issue with WoW install locations not showing up correctly on first run (chops)
Fix an issue with downloads folder not being created
Fix website link on About page to show the cursor
Fix an issue where the details panel would change if another addon was updating.
Fix an issue where an addon row would duplicate with the details dialog open.

UI Updates to details popup (Flippey).
Locale updates. (Oleksandr, McBurn, Morten)
Add a hardware acceleration toggle (Linaori).
Add 'Released At' column to 'My Addons' page. (Chops)
Add some basic Linux support.
Add a standardized format for game version.
Add a toggle to turn off system notifications after an auto update.
Add a single instance lock so you can only launch the app once.
Fix an issue with game version column appearing blank.
Fix an issue where update all did not visual update.
Fix an issue where 'Up to Date' appeared as a greyed out button.
Fix an issue with downloaded files/folders not being cleaned up.
Fix issues with file operations erroring when perfoming multiple downloads.

Add zoom support shortcuts and ctrl + scrollwheel (by Linaori).
Add version label to the 'Get Addons' page (by Chops).
Updates to the addon detail page (by Flippey).
Russian local updates (by Medok).
Add the system notification for auto updates.
Fix some column spacing.
Telemetry for user actions added.
Fix a bug not allowing users to uninstall an addon with no 'installed folders'.
Hopefully less issues with installing multiple addons at once.
Fix some errors related to addons imported from GitHub.
Temporary CF fingerprint endpoint patch.

Update Russian locale.
Try to fix some font blurriness.
Remove debug error in WowInterface provider.

Localize most static text (by Pansa and Medok).
Implemented addon detail view in my-addons (by Flippeey).
Window position/size/maximized state should now be restored when starting the app (by Chops).
Double clicking the titlebar on mac should perform the action set in your system settings (by Chops).
Addon scanning is now much faster.
When scanning addons, the matching channel type should be applied not the default.
Re-scan is now less complicated and should prevent duplicates.
Add the 'Show Folder' button to the addon context menu.
Add http circuit breakers to the providers.
Fix issue with My Addons Provider column not sorting.
Page context data on the footer.
Remove the windows menu bar buttons for mac.
Add WowUp addon provider prototype
Stuff?

Default addon channel can now be set separately per World of Warcraft client.
UI updates.
Bug Fixes.

Remember the last selected client type.
New updater companion app, to deal with in-app update issues.
Fix bug with local image paths for certain users.

Add column sorting for My Addons page.
Try out new error tracking service for telemetry users.

All new scanning method, better results less 'Install' button.
WowInterface support during scan.
Better TukUI support.
New filtering on the 'My Addons' page.
System tray icons should not hang around after you close the app.
New option to switch between Stable and Beta WowUp releases.
UI improvements.
Performance improvements.

When running the app multiple times the original window should restore instead of showing an alert.
Add some color to the In-App update bar to make it more noticeable.
Add a column with the provider name to 'My Addons' page.

Change the value used for current version for Curse addons.
This will require you to re-update all Curse addons.
Bind the client type dropdown on 'My Addons' and 'Get Addons' to the same value to reduce confusion.

Fix crash bug related to 'Update All' and alpha/beta addons.
Fix issue causing updated alpha/beta addons to revert to stable.

Add Wow Interface integration for Scanning.
Add Wow Interface intergration for 'Install from URL'.
Performance updates.

Fix install error when an addon has no files matching the selected channel.
Attempt to fix some perfomance issues during install.
Speed up the scan process.

In-App updates should now use the same GitHub download as the website.
If the In-App update fails to download dont just leave the user with a .bak file.
Attempt to fix startup crash bug from windows for some users.

Improve TukUI support while scanning, will now check for X-Tukui-ProjectID for improved results.
Attempted to make the app single instance, so you cant launch it a bunch of times.

Fix issue where addons from TukUI would not install correctly.
Add confirmation box to addon uninstall.
Newly installed addons should appear in the correct spot in the list, not the bottom.
Uninstalling an addon sould be reflected on the 'Get Addons' page.
Refreshing the 'Get Addons' page should show the correct addons now.
Addon lists should scroll a little more smoothly.
Add the ability to set a global addon channel.
Fix issue with update button being shown over progress bar during auto update.

Add the ability to set an addon as Auto Update, should happen on app start and when hitting refresh.
Added confirmation to the re-scan button to help avoid confusion.

Add ability to install from GitHub URLS.
Add crude error reporting for telemetry users.
Tidy up options screen.
Fix an issue with beta client crashing the app when detected.
Attempt to fix issues with maxmizing the window going being the taskbar.

Add basic addon search for Curse and TukUi.
Add Patreon button.
Fix issue with new version check happening too fast.
Fix crash bug when a search result has no valid file.

Add support for Addon Channels (Stable/Beta/Alpha).
Improved context menu UI.
Fix bug with trying to install TukUi from Get Addons page.
Images should look much better now.
Fix various UI bugs.
Try to add beta support.

My Addon list should no longer duplicate when hitting update-all.
New scrollbar style.
When trying to guess installed addons, prefer toc metadata.
Hopefully improve install/uninstall breaking the app during certain actions.
